backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, contact form submissions, booking management with payment status tracking, Stripe configuration, and role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting phone number (8136009930) and email (ajayyadavddm@gmail.com) updates across CTAButtons, Footer, and ContactPage components with associated test IDs and high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages (Home, Services, Booking, About, Contact, Payment), components (Layout, Footer, CTAButtons, SEO), hooks (booking, checkout, payment status), and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining design tokens for light/dark modes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for Ajay Labour Service in Tinsukia & Doomdooma, mounting React app to #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining seven routes (home, services, booking, about, contact, payment-success, payment-failure) with Layout wrapper and intent-based preloading.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component with validation for name, phone (10-digit), optional email, and message fields, submitting to backend with success confirmation display.
frontend/src/components/CTAButtons.tsx: Call-to-action buttons component with Call Now (tel:+918136009930), WhatsApp (918136009930 with optional pre-filled message), and Book Now navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Displays an accordion-style FAQ section with 8 common questions about booking, pricing, verification, service areas, and policies for the labour service.
frontend/src/components/FeedbackBanner.t: Shows a dismissible banner encouraging users to share feedback, with copy link and WhatsApp share buttons; uses localStorage to remember dismissal state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, contact details (phone, email, location), service areas, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main layout wrapper with sticky header navigation (desktop and mobile), logo, nav links, call-to-action button, and footer outlet for page content.
frontend/src/components/ProjectGallery.t: Displays a grid gallery of 6 completed project images with categories (mason, electrical, plumbing, painting, construction) and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Dynamically updates document title and meta tags (description, keywords, Open Graph, Twitter) for SEO based on provided props.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Shows a grid of 4 customer testimonials with profile images, 5-star ratings, names, and review text for social proof.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Displays four trust badges (Verified Workers, Quick Response, Transparent Pricing, Customer Support) in a responsive grid layout with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBooking.ts: React Query mutation hook for creating bookings by calling the backend actor's createBooking method with booking details.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: React Query mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor, parsing the JSON response to extract the session URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing identity state and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
React Query mutation hook for submitting contact form data (name, phone, email, message) to the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateBookingPayme: React Query mutation hook that updates a booking's payment status and invalidates the bookings query cache on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a blue and orange color theme for Ajay Labour Service, including light and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying company story, founder information, business journey timeline, and core values with SEO metadata for the labour service provider.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Booking form page with validation that creates a booking, stores the ID in sessionStorage, initiates a Stripe checkout session for ₹300 advance fee, and includes WhatsApp booking option.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page displaying contact form, phone/email/location details, business hours, and service area information for Tinsukia and Doomdooma with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring hero section, trust badges, services preview, project gallery, testimonials, FAQ section, and CTA buttons with SEO optimization for Tinsukia and Doomdooma labour services.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Payment failure page displaying error message, troubleshooting steps, refund information, and links to retry booking or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success page that updates booking payment status via API, displays confirmation with booking ID, and shows next steps after successful payment.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services listing page displaying detailed information for six labour categories (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour) with features, experience levels, and timelines.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including Labour blue/orange brand colors), typography, container queries, animations, and responsive breakpoints for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for Ajay Labour Service website including home page, booking system with ₹300 advance payment, trust elements, SEO optimization, testimonials, and mobile-responsive design with blue/orange theme.
